subject: Attention, Beneficiary.
body:
Attention, Beneficiary.
  This is IGP. Larry Wilson of Ghana, POLICE HEAD QUARTER I am contacting you  On Behalf of the Republic of Ghana,the Ghana Police Service which informs you that an arrest was made last  week by the Ghana Police Investigation Department, over the  fraudulent activities going on all over AFRICA. Nigeria Ghana Togo Benin republic After several interrogation yesterday by the Ghana Police, it came to the notice of the Ghana Police force that you are the legal owner of the  20, million united states dollars which was recovered by the Ghana, Police Investigation Department, from some criminal hoodlums.in our Investigation we discovered that you have lost a lot of your money to those hoodlums. note. many years ago  those criminal hacked into our database system, and copy all your details those are the information's they are using to scam you of your money, because of the Unsecured system then in Africa, but now we have set up a device to track down all those criminal, to make sure our country is free of these fraudulent activities, which is going on here in Africa and for our country to bear a good name Again, On behalf of the Republic of Ghana, we kindly apologize to you over these criminal act which was constituted by those men, right now i am in Florida for medical check up and i came here  with the two consignment boxes kindly call me on this number: + 970 900 16 14 call me immediately you get my mail because i have limited time here kindly send me your home address and full name.
Best Regards
Larry Wilson
 Tell +1 970-900-1614   call me or text

subject: Re:  Attention, Beneficiary.
body:
Hello Larry Wilson,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information. It's quite alarming to hear about the fraudulent activities happening in Africa. I'm glad to know that the Ghana Police are taking action against these criminals.

I'm curious, how did you manage to track down these criminals? And how did my name come up during your investigations? 

Also, could you please clarify what you mean by "two boxes"? What do they contain?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
John

subject: Re: Attention, Beneficiary.
body:
*Hello Mr. John    I have received your email. i am very happy to read from
you the two consignment boxes am talking about contained 20, million US
dollars the Ghana Police patrol team caught  this three men  between the
border of Ghana And Togo those men has been sentenced to jail in the Court
last week i am contacting you so that i can bring all this funds to your
doorstep without any further delay kindly check your attachment for the
photos of those arrested criminal and my id card and the photos of the two
consignments do get back to me with your delivery address and phone
numberRegards IGP Larry Wilson*

subject: Re: Attention, Beneficiary.
body:
Hello Mr. Larry Wilson,

Wow, that's quite a story! I can't believe those men were caught with such a large amount of money. It must have been quite a shock for the Ghana Police patrol team. 

I'm curious, how did you come across my contact information? And why do you think I would be the right person to help with this situation?

Also, could you please tell me more about the legal process involved in transferring these funds? I wouldn't want to get involved in anything illegal.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
John

subject: Re: Attention, Beneficiary.
body:
Hello Mr. John

    I have received your email again once i receive your home address and
full name and phone number i will help you to get all back up documents to
your doorstep this is the process
Regards

Larry Wilson

subject: Re: Attention, Beneficiary.
body:
Hello Mr. Larry Wilson,

Thank you for your prompt response. I'm really excited about this process and can't wait to receive the backup documents. However, I'm a bit confused about why you need my home address, full name, and phone number. Could you please explain how this information will be used in the process? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
John

subject: Re: Attention, Beneficiary.
body:
Hello Mr. John

   I got your email. this is the reason why i need your full name all the
documents has been tempered with by those criminal  your full name is need
so that all the document can be in your name your phone number for
communication to avoid any mistake on this delivery. your information's is
very safe with us kindly send them
Regards

Larry Wilson

subject: Re: Attention, Beneficiary.
body:

Thank you for your email and the assurance of safety. It's quite unfortunate to hear about the documents being tampered with, it must be a tough situation.

Could you please explain more about these documents? What kind of documents are they and why are they so important that they need my name on them? Also, how will my phone number help in avoiding mistakes during delivery?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
John
